channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 13 Best Laptops (2024): MacBooks, Windows, Chromebooks, Copilot+ PCs
item.description: These are our favorite Windows laptops, MacBooks, Chromebooks, and Linux portables.

item.title: Block scales back TIDAL investment and shutters TBD in favor of Bitcoin mining

item.title: Donald Trump Isn’t the Only Chaos Agent
item.description: He’s not even the biggest one. Monumental change will instead come from tech—from AI.

item.title: FBI says hackers are sending fraudulent police data requests to tech giants to steal people’s private information

item.title: Large funds are too invested in the energy transition to turn back now
item.description: The recent U.S. election might appear bad for climate tech, but the energy transition has enough financial momentum that experts aren’t expecting inve...

item.title: Former Raya, Dispo exec has a new fund for the biggest out-of-favor tech: consumer
item.description: The idea of one day becoming a venture capitalist always loomed in the back of TJ Taylor's mind. After all, he had an extensive tech background. © 202...

item.title: Hyte Y60 Review: A Clear PC Case for Great Builders
item.description: Hyte’s panoramic PC case puts your building skills on display, for better or worse.

item.title: Led by a founder who sold a video startup to Apple, Panjaya uses deepfake techniques to bite into video dubbing

item.title: Best Organic Mattress & Bedding of 2024: Nontoxic, Natural Sleep
item.description: These nontoxic beds and bedsheets are easier on the environment and your health—and they feel like a dream.

item.title: Forget Screen Time. We Need to Talk About Screen Real Estate
item.description: Spending many hours daily looking at screens feels like a foregone conclusion. The new challenge is paring down what fills them.
